name: dbm-german-bot
description: The official bot of the DBM German Discord server.
author: DBM German

scripts.setup: npm i && node utils/setup.js && node utils/to-dbm.js
scripts.build: (npm run setup) && (docker build --tag dbm-german-bot:3.1.0 .) && (docker save -o dbm-german-bot.tar dbm-german-bot:3.1.0)
scripts.build-arm: (npm run setup) && (docker build --tag dbm-german-bot:3.1.0-arm -f Dockerfile.arm .) && (docker save -o dbm-german-bot_arm.tar dbm-german-bot:3.1.0-arm)
